item.title: Training invariances in deep nets and its consequences I: Linear networks
item.description: Foreword This post, and subsequent posts, aim to be self-content while carrying a narrative that builds up over time. As I walk the fine line between being rigorous and keeping things intuitive, I really appreciate any constructive feedback as to how I can improve my writings (one of the main reasons I started this blog!) so that we all enjoy this process and learn a thing or two.
